name: Kedar Khandeparkar
content: Kedar Office : +91-836-2212-xxx e-mail : kedark@iitdh.ac.in Address : Department of Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Dharwad WALMI campus, Near High Court PB Road, Anjaneya Nagar Karnataka 580011 About me I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology Dharwad, Karnataka. I completed my masters in Computer Science and Engineering from College of Engineering Pune, India and and Ph.D in Electrical Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Bombay, India. My bachelor's was from Goa College of Engineering, Goa University, Goa. My current research interests are in the area of Cyber Physical Systems, Data Science and Cyber Security in Smart Grids, Applied Machine Learning. Links ACM-TCPS IEEE-PS
